title: The Association between Green Tea Consumption and Cognitive Function: A Meta-Analysis of Current Evidence.
abstract: Tea is widely consumed around the world, with green tea showing potential protective effects against cognitive decline, as indicated by multiple studies. These effects are thought to stem from its polyphenols and neuroprotective properties. This study aimed to systematically review and meta-analyze recent observational research on the link between green tea consumption and the risk of cognitive impairment.
